Package it.polimi.se2018.client.view.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlertBox
    Class AlertBox: AlertBox used during the game to warns players of a message
    BoardController
    Class BoardController: the class represents the main board of the game, where the player does his moves.
    ChoosePattern
    Class ChoosePattern: class that handles the choice of the pattern card by the player
    CustomCard
    Class CustomCard: this class handles to create a custom card
    EndGameScene
    Class EndGameScene: class that handles to rank the final points of the players at the end of the game
    GuiController
    Class GuiController: the class responsible of starting the gui, establish a connection with the server and of the switch of the scene depending on the state of the game.
    PatternCardBox
    Class PatternCardBox: class that handles to display the other player's pattern during the turn of the current player
    RoundTrackerBox
    Class RoundTrackerBox: class that handles the display the dice of the round in round tracker
    ToolCardRequest
    Class ToolCardRequest: class that handles to request tool cards
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BoardController.ViewState
    enum for the state of the view during the game
